page.title: 16HOMES AND HOUSES IN RUNCORN
page.content: {Introduction:}There is an old and a new Runcorn. In old Runcorn there are many terraced houses and some newer flats for old people.The first new estate in Runcorn New Town was begun in 1966.Since then many other estates,corporation and private,have been built.The houses,flats,bungalows and maisonettes in the New Town have green spaces,courtyards,car parks and play parks around them.The Old Town also has small parks so everybody can enjoy them.Also it is safe for pedestrians as you can walk to the shops and leisure centres easily.Some houses are brick,some have wood facing,the flats are grey concrete slabs with deck walkways.In places like Halton there is even a Norman castle on the hill which has looked over our homes for many centuries.
